content:
Yeah, I'm really looking forward to making these changes and seeing the savings add up.

For the monthly pass, I think I'll visit the transit agency's website first to get more information on the different types of passes they offer and the prices. I want to make sure I get the right one for my route and commute schedule. If I have any questions or need help, I can always contact their customer service or visit a physical location.

I'm also going to set a reminder to buy the pass a few days before my current tickets expire, so I don't forget and end up buying individual tickets again.

After I get the monthly pass, I'll start packing my own coffee and see how that goes. I might need to experiment with different coffee beans or brewing methods to find one I like, but I'm up for the challenge.

Thanks again for the advice and encouragement! I feel like I'm on the right track now to optimizing my daily commute.
